name: Again to Roam: Prologue
description:
i made this for my dig3024 class please be nice

A short exploration of the origin of my original character Raine, the Rage of the Hereafter, and their demise thousands of years ago.

note: Avast Antivirus may close the game automatically with its CyberCapture. To avoid this, refer to this link https://support.avast.com/en-us/article/Antivirus-CyberCapture/ on how to temporarily deactivate it.
